headline: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts 2025 First Quarter Earnings Conference Call April 25, 2025 – 8:30 a.m. ET
summary: NEW YORK, April 11, 2025--Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) will provide a live webcast of its 2025 first quarter earnings conference call on Friday, April 25, 2025, at 8:30 a.m. ET. The call will be hosted by Chairman, President and CEO, Noel Wallace, Chief Financial Officer, Stan Sutula, and Chief Investor Relations Officer and EVP, M&A, John Faucher. Investors may access the earnings press release, prepared materials and the live audio webcast on Colgate’s website at https://investor.colgat
